entities.name: morfin
entities.description: Morfin is described as a person who lives in the village and has a sister. He is also referred to as 'that Muggle' by Riddle.

entities.name: riddle
entities.description: Riddle is described as a person who looks like another Muggle, according to Morfin.

entities.name: marvolo
entities.description: Marvolo is mentioned as the owner of the black-stoned ring that Morfin wears.

relationships.description: Morfin thinks Riddle looks like another Muggle.
Morfin wears Marvolo's black-stoned ring on his right hand.
